Timecandy8.description: Hold down to instantly get anywhere from 20 minutes to 12 hours of AFK time!

description: The key to Bandit Bob's Party Dungeon! Not sure why a sesame seed opens a door out here in the desert though, seems weird.
The key to Bandit Bob's Party Dungeon! No not that dungeon... you're thinking of Snakenhotep's Dungeon, this one's for Bandit Bob's dungeon. So yea, this is worthless.
